pages.text: $(li)The Poise Forest is a biome composed mostly of Poismoss and Eumus.$(br)$(li)It can be found in the End.$(br)$(li)You can find Poise trees, Bolloom Buds, $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/endergetic/bolloom_fruit)Bolloom Fruits$(/l), Poise Bushes and Poise Beehives in this biome.

$(li)Some animals, such as $(l:patchouli:creatures/the_endergetic_expansion/puff_bug)Puff Bugs$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:pets/the_endergetic_expansion/booflo)Booflos$(/l), can be found in this biome.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome by typing the words $(l)Poise Forest$() in the search box of the $(l:patchouli:perks/natures_compass)Nature's Compass$(/l).
